120020000.text: Greetings, Master Diviner asked me to wait for you.

120020002.text: Can't go. I'm busy right now.

200580000.text: Hey have you registered for the new immersia that just came out

200580003.text: Oh, I call those who play games of Celestial Jade with us buddies

200580004.text: But I was talking about the new foxian immersia called Viridian Soul, we call those buddies too

200580008.text: Long as you have a jade abacus you can join in too, it's very easy

200580009.text: Ah got it, it's basically a mobile game

200580010.text: ? What's a mobile game? I don't understand

200580011.text: Anyway, I've already registered, it's free

200580012.text: Now I can play it at work

200580013.text: You coming? I'll open up a friend room for us

200580015.option: I don't know how to play

200580016.text: But I don't know how to play Celestial Jade

200580014.option: I don't know how to play

200580018.text: Come over to the games parlor when you have time, you'll pick it up in no time

200580025.text: With the number of people on the Express, it should be easy to find enough players

200580026.text: You can teach everyone after learning it, then you'll be able to play together

200580027.text: I'll send you the invite in a bit

200580020.text: Do you also play Celestial Jade when you're working?

200580022.text: It really releases stress, just try it

200580006.text: Oh it's just a foxian sympathetic immersia called Viridian Soul

200580007.text: Specifically for playing Celestial Jade, so we call them buddies

200590000.text: Oh right, I wanna ask for a favor

200590001.text: I went to listen to Mr. Xiyan's storytelling after work, but he stopped at a cliffhanger, I can't take it

200590002.text: He's resuming tomorrow, but at an earlier time

200590003.text: I don't know if I'll be able to get there soon enough after work

200590004.text: If I can't make it, can you go and listen in my stead?

200590007.text: But I haven't heard the story today, would I be able to understand anything tomorrow?

200590011.text: Oh the story today is about the Cloudstrider, and apparently THEY have a train

200590012.text: This train is like the Xianzhou ships and can travel between worlds

200590015.text: That's why I'm asking for a favor

200590016.text: Mr. Xiyan said the Cloudstrider once arrived at a planet called Harilo

200590017.text: But was sucked into a huge conspiracy and even battled a massive aurumaton

200590018.text: Don't spoil whatever happens next to me, just tell me what Mr. Xiyan's version is tomorrow

200590023.text: Alright, looks like I still have to be there in person tomorrow to get the story

200590024.text: I'll tell you my story next time
200590024.option: I'll tell you my story next time

200590010.text: And I haven't heard the story today, it's likely I wouldn't be able to understand anything tomorrow

200600003.text: It's pretty quiet at work today

200600005.text: Your friend Qingque has gone offline

200600009.text: Your friend Qingque has come online

200600022.text: Your friend Qingque has gone offline

200600024.text: Your friend Qingque has come online

200600026.text: Your friend Qingque has gone offline

200600027.text: Your friend Qingque has come online

200600028.text: Your friend Qingque has gone offline

200600030.text: You should pay attention at work!

200600017.text: You should pay attention at work
200600017.option: You should pay attention at work...

200600020.text: A work day is completely wasted

120090000.text: I'm almost at Cloudford, get there quickly

120090001.text: Don't let a slacker do this alone, chop-chop

121160000.text: Hey there. I heard folks from the Artisanship Commission say that you helped clear the Ambrosial Arbor coils. You're indeed as saintly as the general says you are

121160001.text: Saintly? That doesn't sound much like a compliment
121160001.option: It doesn't sound like a compliment to me.

121160004.text: Of course it's a compliment. I thank you from the bottom of my heart. Only when busy people get busy do slackers get a chance to slack off

121160005.text: But, based on your past experience, won't you get a sort of a hunch when I message flatteries to you?

121160006.text: ...A hunch? Like, this person wants something from me?

121160007.text: So, what do you want from me?
121160007.option: What do you want from me?

121160013.text: Do you remember the craftsman apprentice named Chengjie from the Artisanship Commission?

121160016.text: It's okay if you don't remember. Come to the Artisanship Commission. I'll show him to you

121160017.text: I was sent here by the master diviner to assist the Artisanship Commission in assessing the damages

121160018.text: Everything was going well, but now the situation with Chengjie is getting beyond my scope of work...

121160019.text: Can you come over to find me? I am at the Artisanship Commission's port

121160015.text: Chengjie, the apprentice... I think I remember him

121160008.text: How about this? You recall the message now, and we forget about the whole thing
121160008.option: Can I pretend not to know?

121160002.text: Don't beat around the bush. What's the matter?
121160002.option: Sounds like you need a favor

121160010.text: It seems that you are already used to the pleasantries people use on Xianzhou, and know when the work will come.\nYou will go far, young {F#lady}{M#man}! I believe you will soon understand my three basic principles for happiness at work

121160011.text: But the trouble comes from me this time. Please don't shrug it off and do help me

121160003.text: I am brave and kind, and I love to help others.

121160012.text: Great! A brave and kind person like you can definitely help me

121240000.text: Hey, I'm gonna cut to the chase

121240001.text: Have you heard from Chengjie lately?

121240003.text: Wow, you sure forget things fast

121240004.text: Lemme show you some keywords to jog your memory

121240007.text: The person who only worked on his dream for three days

121240009.text: You either only have seven seconds of memory, or you haven't talked to him for too long, or your enthusiasm was hurt by his laziness...

121240013.text: I'm not a close friend of his, but since he's my game mate, I'm still quite worried whether his mental state is...

121240014.text: Is fit to play with me in the future

121240015.text: So, let's go check up on him. I'll see you at the Artisanship Commission

121240010.text: I remember him now. But we haven't talked for a while
121240010.option: We haven't talked for a while

121240011.text: We haven't talked for a while
121240011.option: We haven't talked for a while

121240012.text: Chengjie told me to wait for news, but he never sent anything
121240012.option: He told me to wait for updates

mission.name: A Teacher and a Friend: Continued

121810000.text: Is everything all right on your end?

121810001.text: Stay away from the Divination Commission for now. It could be dangerous there.
121810001.option: Don't go to the Divination Commission

121810003.text: Don't worry. I just saw what happened and posted about it as soon as I took a left turn out the door.

121810004.text: So, what exactly has happened? Why is everyone looking so sluggish?

121810005.text: Guard the gate, Qingque. Don't let anyone in or out of the Divination Commission.

121810006.text: Stay safe. We'll be right there!

121810007.text: Got it. Now I'm a real door guardian.

122180003.text: I don't think so. Look at its paws. I don't think it can hold tiles
122180003.option: Probably not. Look at its hands...

122180008.text: Remember to ask if it has any interest in Celestial Jade

122180009.text: If the answer is yes, then come to the Luofu and we can be game-buddies

122180005.text: Has Celestial Jade ever been popular on the space station? I think they probably don't know how to play. I'm not really sure about the specifics.

122180006.text: A pity. A life without Celestial Jade is a life lived incomplete

122180007.text: *sigh* With so many people, it would be easy to set up matches. A shame

122360004.text: It's bad. The situation is bad!

122360008.text: I should have been more careful

122360009.text: Anyway, {NICKNAME}, come save me! I don't have any other friends here apart from you, my bestie.

122360011.text: I'm at... Where's this place again?

122360012.text: Oh, I heard them saying that this is the hotel in the Dreamscape.

122360013.text: Hurry! Otherwise I might really be a goner.

122360005.text: You've lost everything in such a short amount of time?

122360006.text: Not really... But my current situation is worse!

122370003.text: It looks like they're going to force me to be part of some strange ritual

122370006.text: Qingque? What's going on? Who are "they"?

info.name: Qingque
info.signature: Go ahead and work, just don't interrupt my game
